column4:
More Americans died yesterday from COVID-19.

Than the total number of soldiers killed.

During the last decade in Afghanistan. 

America is NOT turning the corner Donald.

House Dems are working to crush the virus.

The President wants to cut and run.

Who do you think fights #ForThePeople?

Republicans have had 10 years to produce a real healthcare plan.

Crickets. 

Stop lying to America. 

The only plan they have is to take away our healthcare.

They are working overtime.

To take away our healthcare. 

Cruelty is the point.

More than 8 million Americans have been infected with COVID-19. 

Every single one now has a pre-existing condition.

Instead of stealing another Supreme Court seat to take away our healthcare.

Senate Republicans should be working to crush the virus.

Pass. The. Heroes. Act.

Republicans desperately want to destroy healthcare. 

For more than 100 million Americans with pre-existing conditions.

In the middle of a deadly pandemic.

Something is very wrong with these people.

Stop asking Dems about packing the Court.

We aren‚Äôt doing it.

They are.

In order to take away our healthcare.

The American people are in desperate need of COVID-19 relief.

That‚Äôs why House Dems have passed the #HeroesAct.

Twice.

Trump and Senate Republicans are still missing in action.

SHAMEFUL.

These guys couldn‚Äôt stop the coronavirus from ravaging the White House.

And we‚Äôre supposed to believe the Trump administration can flatten the curve in America?

Get. Lost.

The economy is faltering.

Hunger is rising.

Healthcare at risk of being ripped away by the Supreme Court. 

Welcome to Trump‚Äôs America.

Pass. The. Heroes. Act. Now.

Trump to Americans struggling with COVID-19: Drop Dead.

How much more can we take?

Vote like your life depends on it.

Pandemic malpractice continues.

Only one way to stop it.

VOTE.

Senate Republicans are out of control.

Why are they jamming an extreme right wing judge down America‚Äôs throat?

To take away our healthcare.

Wear a mask. 

Practice social distancing.

Wash your hands.

Avoid super spreader events.

Trust science.

50,000 Americans have contracted COVID.

In the last 24 hours. 

They also deserve high quality medical care.

Pass. The. Heroes. Act.

COVID-19 is not a hoax.

Best wishes on a swift recovery to the President, First Lady and every single American infected by the coronavirus.

Wear. A. Mask.

They are trying to steal a second Supreme Court seat.

And rip away our healthcare. 

War.

Healthcare is on the ballot.

Vote like your life depends on it.

It does.

Why are Trump and McConnell trying to steal another Supreme Court seat?

To take away your healthcare.

And obliterate protections for Americans with pre-existing conditions.

FACTS.

It‚Äôs not that complicated.

Wear. A. Mask.

Trump lied. 

Americans died.

The COVID-19 response has been an unmitigated disaster.

What exactly will it take for the sycophants to reach that conclusion?

(Apparently, nearly 200,000 deaths is not sufficient) https://t.co/ktABbv97v8

Treating all workers with dignity and respect is essential.

Living wage. Paid family leave. High quality healthcare. Meaningful pension. 

House Dems continue this fight #ForThePeople.

Happy Labor Day!

The United States has 4% of the world‚Äôs population.

But more than 20 percent of COVID-19 related deaths.

More than any other country on earth. 

Make America Great Again?

This guy has been an unmitigated disaster.

Something is very wrong with these people.

COVID-19 Pandemic.

Economic Recession.

Children in Cages. 

Are we better off today than we were four years ago?

To subvert our free and fair elections.

We. Will. Stop. Him.

#ForThePeople https://t.co/wFZ23FywqQ

It‚Äôs now clear.

The effort to destroy the Post Office is part of a continuing conspiracy to steal the election. 

From the most corrupt administration in American history. 

The entire crime family must be held accountable.

Trump‚Äôs so-called executive order cruelly cuts emergency unemployment benefits. 

By $800 per month.

With more than 30 million Americans collecting unemployment in the midst of a pandemic.

We. Will. Prevail.
